entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early this morning. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 March 2023
